thread.title: Facebook sheds nearly $40 billion in value

title: Facebook sheds nearly $40 billion in value
text:
Facebook sheds nearly $40 billion in value 10:18am GMT - 01:29 
Facebook shares fell on Monday after media reports that a political consultancy that worked on President Donald Trump’s campaign gained inappropriate access to data on 50 million Facebook users. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Facebook shares fell on Monday after media reports that a political consultancy that worked on President Donald Trump’s campaign gained inappropriate access to data on 50 million Facebook users.
